name: INMediaItem
desc: An object that describes a piece of media content, such as a song, TV show, artist, or podcast playlist.

items.name: init(identifier: String?, title: String?, type: INMediaItemType, artwork: INImage?)
items.desc: Creates a media item with an identifier, title, type, and artwork.

items.name: init(identifier: String?, title: String?, type: INMediaItemType, artwork: INImage?, artist: String?)
items.desc: Creates a media item with an identifier, title, type, artwork, and artist.

items.name: var identifier: String?
items.desc: The value your app uses to identify the media item.

items.name: var artist: String?
items.desc: The artist associated with the media item.

items.name: enum INMediaItemType
items.desc: The type of content the media item describes.
